Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhl-110075 No NHAI/13013/3/02-03/CMD-CO/Policy on Toll (Vol-V) Dated: Sept 2011 CIRCULAR NO: NHAICOMMERCIAL_QPERATION 133 This Circular is issued in super cession t0 Circular No. 130 dated 19.4.2011 and other directions issued for undertaking departmental collection of user fee by hiring manpower through Security Agency: 2 It has been decided that system of departmental collection by hiring manpower as interim arrangement for collection of user fee is dispensed forthwith: All Regional Offices and Project Directors are directed not to invite quotations for hiring manpower for collection of user fee, unless specific approval is obtained for specific toll plazas from Head Office giving specific reasons / justifications. 3_ It is further  clarified  that bids for fee collection through competitive   bidding process on fixed annual quotation basis adopting e-tendering process shall be invited by HQ only: Accordingly in order to take timely action by te HQ t0 initiate e-tendering process for toll collection, ROs and PDs are requested t0 take timely advance action for submission of following: forwarding recommendations for toll plaza locations; details of fee notification Conducting seven days traffic surveys for assessment of Annual potenlial collection: 4 This issue with the approval of Competent Authority.
